movie.title: Inception
movie.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movie.title: The Dark Knight
movie.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movie.title: Parasite
movie.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
